w :  i ' m sorry  rod .  i ' m leaving for a conference tomorrow and i ' ll be away two weeks .  i suppose you could send me an e - copy .

question: why does the man say he can ' t submit his assignment on time ?

he has to type his paper once more .
he needs some time to polish his paper .
